title: Winter Wonder Orianna Client Issue
body: I noticed while playing Orianna during a match on Legend of the Poro King that at seemingly random times, my ball would turn invisible. This obviously made things much more difficult considering I use smart cast and could not always tell if the ball had already moved or not. Problem seemed to occur consistently when trying to put the ball on myself or teammates. If I moved the ball on it's own, it worked about half the time. This only happened when I was using the Winter Orianna skin.

replies.body:
Hey Acoenia,

Thanks for reporting this! Have you ever seen this occur on any other map, or are you only noticing this on Legend of the Poro King?

I've had this happen rarely on Summoner's Rift, although I hardly play Orianna to repro it. One instance I noticed it happening was when I shielded an ally. I can't remember if they died with it, or simply jumped/dashed out of range and my ball went invisible temporarily.
Thanks for the lead - we'll look into it!
This may be related to a bug where Orianna gets several of the arrows that point to where the ball is, all pointing in different directions. I've had up to three at once. Just putting it out there.
I think they might be related. During said match, I had one arrow that pointed in one direction then entire time regardless of the placement of the ball.
Sort of, but the ball was completely invisible.
